title: Which Apple Watch should you buy in 2022? Here’s how Series 7 compares to Series 6 and earlier
content:
Apple Watch Series 7 may seem like it offers minimal updates at first glance, but depending on what version you’re upgrading from, it can offer some big improvements. Read on for Apple Watch 7 vs Apple Watch 6 and earlier to help you decide which one to pick in 2022.

more…

The post Which Apple Watch should you buy in 2022? Here’s how Series 7 compares to Series 6 and earlier appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: This detailed guide covers Apple Watch 7 vs Series 6 and earlier across processor, display, key features, price, and more.
